Module qupath.fx

Package qupath.fx.localization

package qupath.fx.localization
Support to create JavaFX properties backed by externalized strings, and that can be refreshed on demand (e.g. when the locale is changed).
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LocaleManager
    Manage available locales, with consistent display and string conversion.
    LocaleSnapshot
    Snapshot of the current locale settings, including the main, display and format locales.
    LocalizedResourceManager
    Class to manage the use of localized strings with JavaFX properties.
